words.def: an artificial source of visible illumination
the inner surface of the hand from the wrist to the base of the fingers
the basic unit of electric current adopted under the Systeme International d'Unites
a diagrammatic representation of the earth's surface (or part of it)
The jack of clubs in loo played with hands of 5 cards.
the upper side of the thighs of a seated person
a close friend who accompanies his buddies in their activities
an informal term for a father
The Indian mulberry , , especially as used to make dye.
a white soft metallic element that tarnishes readily
